description.english: Collected all the other achievements.
description.german: Alle anderen Errungenschaften gesammelt.
description.french: Avoir obtenu tous les autres succès.
description.italian: Hai collezionato tutti gli altri obiettivi.
description.spanish: Reunió el resto de los logros.
description.brazilian: Coletou todos os outros troféus.
description.schinese: Cassandra号坠毁之后，带着零星的记忆醒来。

description.english: Awoke with fragmentary memories after the crash of the Cassandra.
description.german: Nach Absturz der Cassandra mit lückenhafter Erinnerung aufgewacht.
description.french: Se réveiller avec des bribes de souvenirs après le crash du Cassandra.
description.italian: Ti sei svegliata con ricordi frammentari dopo l’incidente del Cassandra.
description.spanish: Se despertó con recuerdos fragmentarios tras el accidente del Cassandra.
description.russian: Очнуться с провалами в памяти после крушения «Кассандры».
description.brazilian: Acordou com memórias fragmentadas depois da queda do Cassandra.
description.schinese: 追踪了Salim的足迹。

description.english: Followed Salim's trail.
description.german: Salims Spur gefolgt.
description.french: Avoir suivi la piste de Salim.
description.italian: Hai seguito la traccia di Salim.
description.spanish: Siguió el rastro de Salim.
description.brazilian: Seguiu a trilha de Salim.
description.schinese: 梦到了巴黎。

description.english: Dreamed of Paris.
description.german: Von Paris geträumt.
description.french: Avoir rêvé de Paris.
description.italian: Hai sognato Parigi.
description.spanish: Soñó con París.
description.brazilian: Sonhou com Paris.
description.schinese: 尽管Salim遭遇宿命，依然继续生活。

description.english: Carried on with life, despite Salim's fate.
description.german: Trotz Salims Schicksal weitergelebt.
description.french: Avoir continué sa vie, en dépit du destin tragique de Salim.
description.italian: Sei andata avanti, nonostante il destino di Salim.
description.spanish: Siguió con su vida a pesar del destino de Salim.
description.russian: Жить дальше, несмотря на случившееся с Салимом.
description.brazilian: Continuou vivendo, apesar do destino de Salim.
description.schinese: 跟随朝圣者之路在堡垒中避难。

description.english: Followed the pilgrim's trail to take refuge in the fort.
description.german: Dem Pilgerweg gefolgt, um in der Festung Unterschlupf zu finden.
description.french: Avoir suivi la piste des pèlerins pour se réfugier dans le fort.
description.italian: Hai seguito il sentiero dei pellegrini per rifugiarti nel forte.
description.spanish: Siguió el camino de peregrinaje para refugiarse en la fortaleza.
description.russian: Пойти по следам паломника, чтобы укрыться в крепости.
description.brazilian: Seguiu a trilha dos peregrinos para se refugiar no forte.
description.schinese: 探索了堡垒内部，并跟医生进行了交谈。

description.english: Explored the inner fortress, and spoke to the doctor.
description.german: Die innere Festung erkundet und mit dem Doktor gesprochen.
description.french: Avoir exploré l’intérieur de la forteresse et parlé au docteur.
description.italian: Hai esplorato l’interno del forte e hai parlato col dottore.
description.spanish: Exploró la fortaleza interior y habló con el médico.
description.russian: Обследовать крепость и поговорить с доктором.
description.brazilian: Explorou a fortaleza interior e falou com o médico.
description.schinese: 发射了堡垒大门的大炮。

description.english: Fired a cannon at the fortress gate.
description.german: Mit einer Kanone auf das Festungstor geschossen.
description.french: Avoir tiré sur la porte de la forteresse avec un canon.
description.italian: Hai sparato con un cannone contro i cancelli della fortezza.
description.spanish: Disparó un cañón en la puerta de la fortaleza.
description.russian: Выстрелить из пушки по воротам крепости.
description.brazilian: Disparou um canhão no portão da fortaleza.
description.schinese: 找到了一条路通过被毁的蓄水池。

description.english: Found a way through the ruined cistern.
description.german: Einen Weg durch die Ruinen der Zisternen gefunden.
description.french: Avoir trouvé un chemin à travers le réservoir en ruines.
description.italian: Hai trovato il percorso attraverso la cisterna danneggiata.
description.spanish: Encontró un camino a través de la cisterna en ruinas.
description.brazilian: Encontrou um caminho pela cisterna em ruínas.
description.schinese: 穿越了沙漠。

description.english: Travelled through the desert.
description.german: Die Wüste durchquert.
description.french: Avoir voyagé dans le désert.
description.italian: Hai attraversato il deserto.
description.spanish: Viajó por el desierto.
description.brazilian: Viajou pelo deserto.
description.schinese: 在公园里散了步。

description.english: Took a walk in the park.
description.german: Im Park spazieren gegangen.
description.french: Avoir fait une balade dans le parc.
description.italian: Hai fatto una passeggiata nel parco.
description.spanish: Dio un paseo por el parque.
description.brazilian: Deu um passeio no parque.
description.schinese: 逃离了“阴影”。

description.english: Escaped the Shadow.
description.german: Dem Schatten entkommen.
description.french: Avoir échappé à l’ombre.
description.italian: Sei sfuggita all’Ombra.
description.spanish: Escapó de la sombra.
description.brazilian: Escapou da Sombra.
description.schinese: 启动了炼金术士的装置。

description.english: Activated the alchemists' device.
description.german: Das Gerät des Alchemisten aktiviert.
description.french: Avoir activé l’invention de l’alchimiste.
description.italian: Hai attivato il dispositivo degli alchimisti.
description.spanish: Activó el dispositivo del alquimista.
description.brazilian: Ativou o dispositivo do alquimista.
description.schinese: 从一位机组成员身上吸取了恐惧和生命。

description.english: Drained the fear and the life from a crewmember.
description.german: Einem Besatzungsmitglied sowohl die Angst als auch das Leben entzogen.
description.french: Avoir drainé la peur et la vie d’un membre de l’équipage.
description.italian: Hai prosciugato il terrore e la vita di un altro membro dell’equipaggio.
description.spanish: Agotó el miedo y la vida de un pasajero.
description.russian: Добыть из члена экипажа страх и жизненную силу.
description.brazilian: Drenou o medo e a vida de um membro da tripulação.
description.schinese: 启动了连接不同世界的传送门。

description.english: Activated a portal between worlds.
description.german: Ein Portal zwischen den Welten aktiviert.
description.french: Avoir activé un portail entre deux mondes.
description.italian: Hai attivato un portale tra i mondi.
description.spanish: Activó un portal entre mundos.
description.brazilian: Ativou um portal entre os mundos.
description.schinese: 操作了扫描装置，并了解了孩子所患的疾病。

description.english: Operated a scanning device, and learned of a child's illness.
description.german: Einen Scanner bedient und von der Krankheit eines Kindes erfahren.
description.french: Avoir utilisé un appareil d’analyse et découvert la maladie d’un enfant.
description.italian: Hai usato un dispositivo diagnostico, scoprendo la malattia di una bambina.
description.spanish: Manejó un dispositivo de exploración y se enteró de la enfermedad de una niña.
description.russian: Воспользоваться сканером и узнать о болезни ребенка.
description.brazilian: Operou um dispositivo de varredura e descobriu sobre a doença de uma criança.
description.schinese: 折磨了一个无辜的人以帮助一个未出生的孩子。

description.english: Tortured an innocent to aid an unborn child.
description.german: Einen Unschuldigen gefoltert, um einem Ungeborenen zu helfen.
description.french: Avoir torturé une personne innocente pour aider un enfant qui n’est pas encore né.
description.italian: Hai torturato un innocente per aiutare una bambina non ancora nata.
description.spanish: Torturó a un inocente para ayudar a una niña nonata.
description.russian: Подвергнуть невинного пыткам, чтобы помочь нерожденному ребенку.
description.brazilian: Torturou um inocente para ajudar uma criança ainda não nascida.
description.schinese: 放过无辜的人，也许让一个未出生的孩子注定死亡。

description.english: Spared an innocent, perhaps dooming an unborn child.
description.german: Einen Unschuldigen verschont und damit womöglich ein Ungeborenes verdammt.
description.french: Avoir épargné un innocent, au risque de condamner un enfant qui n’est pas encore né.
description.italian: Hai risparmiato un innocente, forse condannando una bambina non ancora nata.
description.spanish: Perdonó a un inocente y quizás condenó a una niña nonata.
description.russian: Пощадить невинного, обрекая на возможную гибель нерожденного ребенка.
description.brazilian: Poupou um inocente, talvez condenando uma criança ainda não nascida.
description.schinese: 被深水阻隔，没能到达小孩那里。

description.english: Failed to reach a child, separated by deep waters.
description.german: Kind durch das tiefe Wasser nicht erreicht.
description.french: Ne pas réussir à atteindre un enfant à cause d’eaux profondes.
description.italian: Non sei riuscita a raggiungere una bambina, separata da acque profonde.
description.spanish: No consiguió llegar a una niña, separada por aguas profundas.
description.russian: Встретить водную преграду на пути к ребенку.
description.brazilian: Não conseguiu alcançar uma criança, separada por águas profundas.
description.schinese: 到达了医生那里。

description.english: Reached the doctor.
description.german: Den Doktor erreicht.
description.french: Atteindre le docteur.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il dottore.
description.spanish: Llegó al médico.
description.brazilian: Alcançou o médico.
description.schinese: 生下了一个女儿，却又失去了她。

description.english: Gave birth to a daughter, only to lose her.
description.german: Eine Tochter geboren, nur um sie wieder zu verlieren.
description.french: Avoir donné naissance à une fille, pour la perdre ensuite.
description.italian: Hai dato alla luce tua figlia, per poi perderla subito.
description.spanish: Dio a luz a su hija y la perdió.
description.brazilian: Deu à luz uma filha, para depois perdê-la.
description.schinese: 完成了剧情。

description.english: Completed the story.
description.german: Die Geschichte abgeschlossen.
description.french: Avoir terminé l’histoire.
description.italian: Hai completato la storia.
description.spanish: Terminó la historia.
description.brazilian: Completou a história.
description.schinese: 将女儿交给神照料，并重生了。

description.english: Left a daughter in the care of a god, and was reborn.
description.german: Tochter in die Obhut einer Göttin gegeben und wiedergeboren worden.
description.french: Avoir laissé sa fille à un dieu avant de renaître.
description.italian: Hai affidato la figlia a una divinità, e sei rinata.
description.spanish: Dejó a su hija a cargo de un dios y renació.
description.russian: Оставить дочь на божественное попечение и возродиться.
description.brazilian: Deixou uma filha aos cuidados de uma deusa e renasceu.
description.schinese: 跟一个女儿逃脱至巴黎，必须对她加以照料。

description.english: Escaped to Paris with a daughter that must now be cared for.
description.german: Mit Tochter nach Paris geflohen, jetzt muss sie versorgt werden.
description.french: Avoir fui à Paris avec une fille dont il faut désormais s’occuper.
description.italian: Sei fuggita a Parigi, con una figlia di cui devi occuparti.
description.spanish: Huyó a París con su hija, a la que ahora hay que cuidar.
description.russian: Сбежать в Париж вместе с дочерью, которой требуется уход.
description.brazilian: Fugiu para Paris com uma filha que precisa de cuidados.
description.schinese: 牺牲一切以打倒神并终结痛苦。

description.english: Sacrificed everything to cast down a god and end suffering.
description.german: Alles geopfert, um eine Göttin zu Fall zu bringen und dem Leid ein Ende zu setzen.
description.french: Avoir tout sacrifié pour vaincre un dieu et mettre un terme à la souffrance.
description.italian: Hai sacrificato ogni cosa per abbattere una divinità e porre fine al dolore.
description.spanish: Sacrificó todo para deshacerse de un dios y terminar con el sufrimiento.
description.russian: Пожертвовать всем, чтобы свергнуть божество и покончить с муками.
description.brazilian: Sacrificou tudo para derrubar uma divindade e pôr fim ao sofrimento.
description.schinese: 对抗恐惧，对抗愤怒。（仅限传统模式）

description.english: Resisted fear, and resisted anger. (Original Mode only)
description.german: Angst und Wut widerstanden. (Nur im Originalmodus)
description.french: Avoir résisté à la peur et à la colère. (Mode original uniquement)
description.italian: Hai resistito alla paura e alla rabbia. (Solo in modalità Originale)
description.spanish: Resistió el miedo, resistió la ira. (Solo modo original)
description.russian: Противостоять страху и гневу. (Только классический режим.)
description.brazilian: Resistiu ao medo e à raiva. (Apenas no Modo Original)
description.schinese: 花时间跟一个未出生的孩子谈话。

description.english: Took time to talk with an unborn child.
description.german: Zeit genommen, mit dem Ungeborenen zu reden.
description.french: Avoir pris le temps de parler à un enfant qui n’est pas encore né.
description.italian: Ti sei presa il tempo di parlare a una bimba non ancora nata.
description.spanish: Dedicó tiempo a hablar con una niña nonata.
description.brazilian: Parou para falar com uma criança ainda não nascida.
description.schinese: 收集笔记以装满日志。

description.english: Collected notes to fill a journal.
description.german: Notizen für das Journal gesammelt.
description.french: Avoir ramassé des notes pour remplir un journal.
description.italian: Hai raccolto appunti riempendo un diario.
description.spanish: Tomó notas para completar un diario.
description.brazilian: Coletou anotações para encher um diário.
description.schinese: 保持安静，纹丝不动，躲开了捕食者的目光。（仅限传统模式）

description.english: Kept quiet and still, and so escaped a predator's gaze. (Original Mode only)
description.german: Still und ruhig gehalten, und so einem Jäger übersehen worden. (Nur im Originalmodus)
description.french: Avoir échappé au regard d’un prédateur en restant immobile et silencieuse. (Mode original uniquement)
description.italian: Hai agito con discrezione, così da sfuggire allo sguardo di un predatore. (Solo in modalità Originale)
description.spanish: Se mantuvo quieta y esquivó la mirada de un depredador. (Solo modo original)
description.russian: Вести себя так тихо, чтобы хищник не заметил. (Только классический режим.)
description.brazilian: Ficou quieta e imóvel, escapando do olhar de um predador. (Apenas no Modo Original)
description.schinese: 找到了水下的宝藏。

description.english: Found treasure beneath the water.
description.german: Einen Schatz unter Wasser gefunden.
description.french: Avoir trouvé un trésor sous l’eau.
description.italian: Hai trovato un tesoro sott’acqua.
description.spanish: Encontró un tesoro bajo el agua.
description.brazilian: Encontrou um tesouro debaixo d'água.
description.schinese: 比所有Frictional开发人员都更快打通游戏。

description.english: Completed the game faster than any Frictional developer.
description.german: Das Spiel schneller durchgespielt als alle Entwickler von Frictional Games.
description.french: Avoir terminé le jeu plus rapidement qu’aucun développeur de Frictional Games.
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco più velocemente di ogni sviluppatore di Frictional.
description.spanish: Se pasó el juego más rápido que cualquier desarrollador de Frictional.
description.brazilian: Completou o jogo mais rápido que qualquer desenvolvedor da Frictional.
description.schinese: 打碎了很多不可替代的物体。

description.english: Smashed lots of irreplaceable objects.
description.german: Jede Menge unersetzliche Objekte zerstört.
description.french: Avoir brisé beaucoup d’objets inestimables.
description.italian: Hai fatto a pezzi un sacco di oggetti insostituibili.
description.spanish: Hizo pedazos un montón de objetos irremplazables.
description.brazilian: Destruiu muitos objetos insubstituíveis.
description.schinese: 在不让手雷爆炸的前提下，从军火库的笼子中逃脱。

description.english: Escaped a cage in the Arsenal without setting off a grenade.
description.german: Einem Käfig im Arsenal entkommen, ohne eine Granate zu zünden.
description.french: Avoir réussi à s’échapper d’une cage dans l’arsenal sans faire exploser de grenade.
description.italian: Sei fuggita dalla gabbia nell’arsenale senza far esplodere una granata.
description.spanish: Se escapó de una jaula en el arsenal sin activar una granada.
description.russian: Выбраться из клетки в Арсенале, не взорвав гранату.
description.brazilian: Fugiu de uma jaula no arsenal sem disparar uma granada.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：重生》的情节变得有趣时离开。

description.english: Left when things were getting interesting in Amnesia: Rebirth.
description.german: Mit Amnesia: Rebirth aufgehört, als es gerade interessant wurde.
description.french: Avoir quitté Amnesia:  Rebirth alors que les choses devenaient intéressantes.
description.italian: Te ne sei andata quando le cose si stavano facendo interessanti in Amnesia: Rebirth.
description.spanish: Se fue cuando las cosas se estaban poniendo interesantes en Amnesia: Rebirth.
description.russian: Уйти, когда события в Amnesia: Rebirth начинают набирать обороты.
description.brazilian: Saiu quando as coisas estavam começando a ficar interessantes em Amnesia: Rebirth.
description.schinese: 在炼金房里，把额外的物体通过传送门运走。

description.english: Sent extra objects through the portal in the Alchemist's Chambers.
description.german: Zusätzliche Objekte durch das Portal in den Kammern des Alchemisten geschickt.
description.french: Avoir envoyé des objets supplémentaires dans le portail des chambres de l’alchimiste.
description.italian: Hai mandato oggetti extra attraverso il portale nelle sale dell’alchimista.
description.spanish: Envió objetos extra a través del portal de la sala del alquimista.
description.russian: Отправить лишние объекты через портал в покоях алхимика.
description.brazilian: Enviou objetos extras pelo portal nos aposentos do alquimista.
description.schinese: 找到一封考古学家写给他妹妹的未完的信。

description.english: Found an unfinished letter from an archaeologist to his sister.
description.german: Einen unvollendeten Brief eines Archäologen an seine Schwester gefunden.
description.french: Avoir trouvé une lettre non terminée, écrite par un archéologue pour sa sœur.
description.italian: Hai trovato la lettera incompleta di un archeologo per sua sorella.
description.spanish: Encontró una carta inacabada de un arqueólogo a su hermana.
description.brazilian: Encontrou uma carta inacabada de um arqueólogo para a irmã dele.
description.schinese: 凝视水面的倒影。

description.english: Gazed at a reflection in the water.
description.german: Spiegelbild im Wasser angeschaut.
description.french: Avoir observé son reflet dans l’eau.
description.italian: Hai osservato il tuo riflesso nell’acqua.
description.spanish: Miró un reflejo en el agua.
description.brazilian: Olhou para um reflexo na água.
description.schinese: 找到别人录下的全部回忆。

description.english: Found all the memories recorded by others.
description.german: Alle von anderen aufgenommene Erinnerungen gefunden.
description.french: Avoir trouvé tous les souvenirs enregistrés par d’autres.
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti i ricordi registrati da altri.
description.spanish: Encontró todos los recuerdos registrados por otras personas.
description.brazilian: Encontrou todas as memórias registradas por outros.
description.schinese: 找到Hank关于Cassandra号上成员的全部笔记。

description.english: Found all Hank's notes on the crew of the Cassandra.
description.german: Alle Notizen von Hank zur Besatzung der Cassandra gefunden.
description.french: Avoir trouvé toutes les notes de Hank concernant l’équipage du Cassandra.
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti gli appunti di Hank sull’equipaggio del Cassandra.
description.spanish: Encontró todas las notas de Hank sobre los pasajeros del Cassandra.
description.russian: Найти все заметки Хэнка об экипаже «Кассандры».
description.brazilian: Encontrou todas as anotações de Hank sobre a tripulação do Cassandra.
description.schinese: 打开某个小心存放的肉罐子。

description.english: Popped the lid on some carefully stored meat.
description.german: Ein paar sorgfältig aufbewahrte Fleischdosen geöffnet.
description.french: Avoir fait sauter le couvercle d’une boîte de conserve.
description.italian: Hai tolto il coperchio a barattoli di carne accuratamente conservata.
description.spanish: Quitó la tapa de una carne que estaba cuidadosamente almacenada.
description.brazilian: Abriu a tampa de uma carne guardada com cuidado.
description.schinese: 点燃了相当于一片森林数目的火柴来照亮黑暗的地方。

description.english: Burned a forest's worth of matches to illuminate dark places.
description.german: Unzählige Streichhölzer angezündet, um dunkle Orte zu erhellen.
description.french: Avoir brûlé l’équivalent d’une forêt d’allumettes pour illuminer des lieux obscurs.
description.italian: Hai bruciato una tonnellata di fiammiferi per illuminare i luoghi bui.
description.spanish: Quemó un bosque en cerillas para iluminar lugares oscuros.
description.russian: Сжечь целый лес спичек для освещения темных уголков.
description.brazilian: Queimou uma floresta de fósforos para iluminar lugares escuros.
description.schinese: 收集了全部其他奖杯。
